alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, western Liberty and north central Harris Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 650 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bush Intercontinental Airport, or near Spring, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Aldine, Kingwood, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Splashtown, Porter Heights, Lake Houston, New Caney and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
